title: Unable to post a support ticket / account banned why?
body:
When I try to post a support ticket (I'm logged in) when I click to tab to write a ticket it just logs me out and back in, then redirects me to the main support page over and over and over....thus making it impossible for me to submit a support ticket....

I tried logging on for the first time today in I'd say about two years, only to find that my account has been suspended permanently? So I go to check the e-mail address for that account and what do you know, the last e-mail I got from Riot was over 2 years ago regarding TOS changes. I never got any email about why my account was permanently suspended.

This depresses me very much because I know it was not my personality that resulted in this ban  (never had warnings and haven;t played in years) and may have been some random 3rd party program that was on my friends laptop last time I played. I have no idea and I can only guess. I'm going to be in the hospital for a very long time and unable to access a p.c. or anything of the last so today and tomorrow I was going to try and track down any League friends from years ago and play a few last games. I guess I can't..and I don't even know why..

replies.body: It sounds like a lot of players have been having issues with the support site over the past couple of days, but it doesn't actually look like this account is suspended for behavior or anything like that. There were some suspicious logins which looked like your account was hacked so a temporary suspension was placed until the original creator verified themselves. If you still can't get a ticket sent over, shoot us an e-mail at support@riotgames.com to start the recovery process!

If you still can't get a ticket sent over, shoot us an e-mail at support@riotgames.com to start the recovery process!

Okay, thank-you tomorrow morning I will check if I can submit a ticket and if the issue persists, I will send an e-mail. Thank-you for the hasty reply. 

(It felt, as it were, like a judge's gavel had fallen upon me, and I knew for the first time the pain wrought from a ban-hammer that only the innocent may know. And so this pain was vanquished, beset instead by many tasks as have been performed in the days of ole)

Always happy to help when we can ^_^

That monologue tho....quite artistic, reminds me Jhin xD
Any help? Please? Riot? I can't submit support tickets? It's bugged?
